| History                 = The Aberrant Crimes Division (A.C.D. for short){{r|Sentry Vol 3 1}} was a law enforcement branch of the [[Federal Bureau of Investigation (Earth-616)|FBI]].{{r|Jessica Jones - Marvel Digital Original #1|; Blind Spot: Chapter 2}} They were responsible for monitoring [[Robert Reynolds (Earth-616)|Bob Reynolds]] to make sure he used the [[Confluctor]] to regularly visit [[Earth-TRN681|Sentry World]].{{r|Sentry Vol 3 1}}

When [[John Jonah Jameson III (Earth-616)|John Jameson]], a former member of the FBI's [[Anti-Symbiote Task Force (Earth-616)|Anti-Symbiote Task Force]], suddenly went missing while investigating [[Doverton]], [[Colorado (State)|Colorado]], [[Mercedes Knight (Earth-616)|Misty Knight]] was dispatched to locate him; discovering that the town had been destroyed and that [[Cletus Kasady (Earth-616)|Carnage]] was back and more powerful than ever.{{r|Web of Venom: Cult of Carnage Vol 1 1}}
